name: financial_results
description: Information about financial results such as revenues and expenses across different segments and quarters

fields.fieldDescription: General category of the data. Can be Revenues, Non Interest Expenses
Segment of the business. E.g Institutional Securities, Wealth Management or Investment Management. User may refer to them via shorthand (e.g. IS, WM or IM)
Subsegment level 1. Subdivision of the segment. E.g. Investment Banking, Sales & Trading or Asset Management
Fiscal quarter of the data entry
Numerical balance value for the entry
